title: Khanabad, Fars
text: Khanabad (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Khānābād; also known as Khānābād-e Bāshī) is a village in <a href="Shurab%20Rural%20District%20%28Fars%20Province%29">Shurab Rural District</a>, in the <a href="Central%20District%20%28Arsanjan%20County%29">Central District</a> of <a href="Arsanjan%20County">Arsanjan County</a>, <a href="Fars%20Province">Fars Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 364, in 71 families.
